title: Winning Streak
overview: Each week five players will be in with a shot of winning some fantastic cash prizes with the return of all the best National Lottery Winning Streak games including favourites Cash Cubes, Patience, Money Match, Pick a Prize, Trapdoor, Wheel Reveal and, of course, the Grand Prize Wheel. In association with the National Lottery, this season not only one player but two players may have the opportunity to spin the iconic Winning Streak Grand Prize Wheel and win up to 500,000 euro each.
